name: CheckList
description: The Check List component displays the list of items to cover to become certified. Each item has a title, a description and an image. In each item it is possible to hide the description and image with a toggle.

variations.name: Default Variation
variations.description: Default variation where each item in the checklist contains a title, description, and image, with a toggle to hide description and image.

config.label: Section Title
config.placeholder: Enter the section title for the checklist

config.label: Item Title
config.placeholder: Enter the title for the checklist item

config.label: Item Description
config.placeholder: Enter the description for the checklist item
